title: Noam Chomsky: How the US Suppresses Americans without Violence
description:
Click here for the full interview: https://usefulidiots.substack.com/p/extended-episode-noam-chomsky-were?r=je5va&s=w&utm_campaign=post&utm_medium=web

Become a Useful Idiot for extended interviews and bonus content at http://usefulidiots.substack.com

Professor Noam Chomsky quotes George Orwell's introduction to Animal Farm when explaining how the US silences dissent without throwing anyone in the gulag. The propaganda is so widespread and easy because the trick is that we help the US silence the truth. Listen to Chomsky's dark explanation and check out the full interview.
